alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 5:11AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN WEBER...SOUTH CENTRAL BOX ELDER...WESTERN SALT LAKE...WESTERN DAVIS...NORTHWESTERN UTAH AND NORTHEASTERN TOOELE COUNTIES... At 508 AM MDT...an area of snow showers was near Stansbury Park, or 7 miles northeast of Grantsville...moving southeast at 20 mph. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, Tooele, Grantsville, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Midvale, Herriman, Eagle Mountain, Alpine, Stansbury Park, Bluffdale, Cedar Fort and Ophir. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 281 and 299. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 73 and 114. * drivers will encounter a quick reduction in visibility upon entering these snow showers, along with the potential for slick conditions. Reduce driving speeds. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
